attributes.action: David Cameron to introduce a labelling system to show meat produced without killing badgers - "Badger Friendly Produce"
attributes.additional_details:
We require the government to introduce a system of labelling for foods produced "Without Harming Badgers". This would provide choice - a key-stone in Conservative policy - for customers to select, by an easily identifiable symbol,  produce has been produced WITHOUT harm to badgers.
The Badger Logo Labelling System.
